com.compendium.ui.menus
Class UIMenuWindows

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.menus.UIMenuWindows
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIMenu, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UIMenuWindows
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIMenu, java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class creates and manages the Window menu.
